content.detailedDescription: I stepped out side at 5:30 pm 1/7/2015 at 5:35 i noticed a bright light in the s.W sky at about 20 to 30 degrees at first i thought just an airplane but then noticed the light was not moving so i got my binoculars to get a better look that is when i noticed a second object hovering paralelle but at quite a distance from the closer object i observed the object closest to me which was actually serveral miles from my position the object remained stationary for about 10 mins. 5:35 to 5:45 at that time both objects begin to slowly move in a s.W direction until they were no longer in my line of sight at 5:55 pm .
content.summary: Noticed bright object hovering low s.W horizon when viewed through binoculars noticed second object

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv ...Window across room toward north east...Watch planes regularly fecend ans ascend this vector...Noticed bright light decend in crash like 30 degrees decent...Took just seconds...Am new to area but was north of i -45 east of highway...Looked the suze of a shooting star but very bright...Did not move across sky ...Came in to my field of vision for very short seconds up to down crash like decent...If it was a plane was moving to fast to pull up...No way...Light resembled bright landing light...Single bulb...Unbielveble. ...Cool but scary too...
content.summary: Looking out window to noeth east observed bright object in crash like decent .Moon came up 45 minutes later in same area i saw object.Bright light lasted just seconds to earth..No way it could have corrected in time to avoid impacked..

content.detailedDescription: After remaining in formation for a minimum of 20 minutes the southern most "light' moved south relatively quickly.  after about 5-10 minutes the middle light moved to the south faster than the first.  after about another 15 minutes, the last light disappeared.  i turned my head and when i looked back it was gone.
content.summary: Three lights 30 - 40 degrees off horizon, remained in formation for 20 +/- min

content.detailedDescription: My husband, my 4 year old daughter, and i had seen a reddish/orange fireball like object in the sky above the trees at my the apartment complex where i live, the night of new years eve. we were watching tv and i looked out the balcony of our third floor apartment and had notice this strange object. at first i blew it off as an air plane. the second time it came around i realized it wasn't.  we had seen what we believe to be the same object three times within ten minutes.  it must have been circling because we had seen it each time coming from the same place, flying in the same direction.(unless it was three different fireball looking objects). there was no sound coming from it as we could tell. the object seemed to being at the speed of what an airplane would be. two nights later my husband had seen the object again.  i did take a short video of it on my phone. it did not come out to well and in the video it seems as thought the fireball like object is bouncing around a little bit but it was not.
content.summary: Looked like a fireball moving at the speed of an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
1. hingham ,massachusetts going to pick up the boy i nanny for at guitar lessons.

2. i was driving and it was directly infront of me in the sky.

3. at first i thought it was one of those drones that many people have these days but i could not find anything similar after doing further research.

4. it was a complete made up of tiny little lights. it was traveling in a straight line heading to the east of me, then i couldn't see it due to a telephone pole to my left so i came to a stop waiting for it to keep going and emerge from behind it, but after a few seconds i realized it was hovering so i pulled up a few feet. after this, it kept traveling going south east, and then completely disappeared. 

5. i was on the phone with my fiancée while this happened and i was telling him what i was seeing as it was going on. i thought to take a picture but at the time i was telling myself there was no way it could have been anything but a plane or drone. i kept driving and almost had to pull over due to extreme anxiety. while i was observing it i was basically in awe.

6. it kept traveling south east then disappeared.
content.summary: Lights in sky made up large triangle shape in hingham massachusetts

content.detailedDescription:
this took place a couple years ago in central kentucky. i was at my little brother's baseball game, sitting backwards on the bleachers to watch storm clouds roll in from the distance. i have more of an appreciation for meteorology than for sports, sue me. at one point, i looked up from my phone, and my attention was suddenly drawn to some movement by the forest area, adjacent to the field. as i looked closer, i realized it was some type of aircraft. it was in the shape of an equilateral triangle, solid black in color, kinda geometric and block-like, with one white light on each point of the triangle (underneath) and some kind of opening in the middle. it flew disturbingly close to the ground. i can't remember the size exactly, but i can ballpark (lawl) that it was larger than a helicopter, but smaller than the average domestic-flight plane.
   


   watching it, i took note of its movement; it was unlike anything i've ever seen (er.. supposed to have seen) in my life. it didn't seem to pay any attention to classic aerodynamics. it seemed to glide through space (anti-gravity style) rather than "fly", and was eerily silent. as the experience came to an end, i saw this craft suddenly change flight path. it turned on a dime (without banking) about 300°, and descended below the trees, out of sight. i can still vividly remember the sudden and completely overwhelming curiosity i had. i wanted nothing more at that point than to drop everything, and run after it. i didn't want it to be over. i wanted to know everything about everything. for some reason, i didn't go after it. i was still a bit dazed, trying to process how much of my entire outlook on life i was going to have to tweak. i was a much different person back then. shy, and timid, like your average socially-awkward and confused 17-year-old.

i still kick myself for not doing everything within my power to find. that. craft.

 
   i actually wouldn't have noticed it at all if i hadn't been turned around, but thank god that i wasn't the only person to see it. a little girl sitting next to me looked up from her dsi just in time to catch a glimpse of it. "look, grandpa! a ufo!!!" she pointed and shouted. her grandfather paid no attention, so nobody else but her and i saw it. at that point, i knew for a fact that i wasn't crazy after all. we both knew what we were looking at.


   for some reason, i didn't feel inclined to point it out to anyone around me (which included the rest of my family), as the little girl did. i simply sat there, taking in every single nanosecond of exposure to such a sight. i've been hopelessly interested in the entire subject of military technology and possible extra-terrestrial involvement with the government for quite some time now. 


   i felt an extreme need to tell anyone who sees and reads this: these things are indeed real. i can't say for sure whether or not these craft are owned and operated by the us military and/or foreign life, but i can say without a shadow of doubt that they're out there, being used by someone for something. for the life of me, i cannot understand why i saw this craft in the place that i did. what's so interesting about a small town in kentucky? the only thing i can think is that it had some correlation with the severe storm that approached afterward, as people commonly have sightings around disasters (natural and man-made).
content.summary: Saw a black triangular ufo glide toward me over the treetops, turn, and sharply descend out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: 3 objects observed while whale watching
content.summary: Hovered over ocean while whale watching

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I first saw ufos on july 2, 2012: and a few months later, i saw some translucent being in like the early fall of the year 2012. i watched this being for maybe 2 through 5 hours, but i didn't time it. the first ufos that i ever saw, on july 2, 2012, where bluish, greenish, and violet. i saw like 8 ufos that night.

anyways, i am a blogger, and i made a blog about the ufos i have seen, and also the being that i saw in the year 2012. the following is from my blog that i made almost a year ago:


first off, i saw my alien in august of 2012. i have been seeing the ufos (every day except when its cloudy out) for exactly 5 months now, since september 8th of 2013.

ill now explain my alien encounter: it must have been august of 2012, and it was very windy out that day. it was bright and sunny outside and it was warm because it was the summer. to make a long story short, i noticed a certain tree was blowing funny, it was windy outside. i ended up getting my bb gun to look more closely at the anomaly- the tree that was blowing too much. i sat on my bed and looked outside at the tree. at first i didnt notice anything peculiar. i was just looking at the said tree with a 4 power scope attached to a daisy air rifle. then after a few minutes, something appeared in my scope. it was a ~3 foot circle, greyish green, with 2 "eyes". they werent eyes but they were letting light pass right through the holes and they were positioned in the middle of the greyish green circle. im going to call this circle with the two "eyes" a "face". so i proceeded to stare at this "face" with my bb gun, sitting on my bed in my abode.

a few minutes later came splashes of light through the forehead of the "face". it wasnt producing any light, rather, it was producing holes that the ambient light could pass through. circle after circle of light was passing though, every second or so: this lasted for maybe a half an hour or so, but i didnt time anything.

next the whole "face" thing disappeared and something else was there. what appeared was the alien itself, translucent or transparent. i honestly didnt know what i was looking at, at that time; i was dumbfounded by the whole encounter to be candid. anyways, i noticed the alien moving around and looking at me. it was hard to observe because the alien was translucent or transparent. i saw the aliens face, body, arms, maybe a leg and foot, and his nose from the side view. the alien was about 15 yards from me, on top of my neighbors roof the whole time. the alien didnt move from on top of my neighbors roof, but it was moving in place. i saw the alien moving his head around, looking at me; and its a good thing he was moving his head because i wouldnt have been able to discern it otherwise. i saw the alien moving its hand and arm back and forth to its head very fast. 


ohh yeah, and later i did a calculation, and the alien must have been 3 or 4 feet tall. if two roof shingles/caps equal a foot.

it was a very spiritual experience for me and i think about my alien encounter every day; and i bet you would think of aliens too if you literally saw one like i did. weird, i know, but it still happened.

the whole time i was watching the alien was a long time, maybe two through four hours. all i know is that it was daylight out when i first started watching the alien, and i stopped watching the alien when it got dark out and i couldnt see the alien good. its hard to watch a translucent alien at night even though it was about 15 yards away.

so thats what i remember of my alien encounter and i will never forget it, even though its a little vague now.

next, the ufos.

i see ufos on a daily basis, except when its cloudy outside. i first noticed the ufos on september 8th of 2013. but i did see ufos one day on july 2, 2012, but i didnt see those for more then a few minutes.

anyways, i first noticed the ufos that i see every day (practically) on september 8th of 2013. i noticed a "star" that started out higher in the sky, then the next time i went to smoke a cigarette it was lower and to the right; then next time i went to smoke, it was gone. the next day i critically observed this "star" and i noticed it was moving in place; i figured it must be a ufo. i then noticed more and more "stars" move over the next few weeks until i drew the conclusion that all the "stars" in my sky are actually ufos.

the ufos disguise themselves as "stars" in the sky but they actually move. the ufos move in every direction, but you cant discern if they are moving closer or farther away. the ufos are above the clouds. the ufos are lite up, so they must use some type of light for this. the ufos are scattered throughout the sky like stars. 

i want to know who is in the ufos and why dont we have that kind of technology. i can only think of a dichotomy; its either extraterrestrial or military. the ufos remain in the sky all night, i dont watch them after i go to bed though. i dont know what the ufos do during the day, but they are in my sky at night. i dont know where else you can see ufos besides massachusetts. 

i actully made a video about my alien encounter and the ufos i saw in 2012 and the 5 signs in the clouds i saw... let me get the video and i will close with that.

the signs of the times!

the above was from my blog that i made about a year ago. if you want to watch the video i made about the being i saw, and the ufos that i see, go to youtube.Com. next, search for "[title moved to fi section/cms/tg]". then search through the next few pages until you see a video titled "[title moved to fi section/cms/tg]". i have six videos total of myself, and at least a couple other videos, i mention that, "i saw an alien".

i am very serious, and i have vivid memories of seeing a being in the year 2012. also, i witnessed at least a half dozen ufos on july 2, 2012, or a few months before i saw that being. these ufos were very bright, and they were colored: i remember seeing blue, green, and purple ufos on july 2, 2012. but, as of september 8th of 2013, i noticed that the "stars" appear to move, and i have been watching the "stars" move for about a year and 4 months now. i don't know if this is an optical illusion, or if i am seeing ufos? i have seen some ufos move in a straight line, and then dim into blackness, and i have witnessed this at least a few times. they look like stars, they blink, they glow like a star, but i see them moving around.

thanks for taking the time to read this.

~peace~
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have seen many ufos, and i saw a translucent being in the year 2012.

content.detailedDescription: On 1/6/15 around 7:00-7:45pm i told my wife that i had a feeling of gloom or an ominous feeling that something was going to happen. just a few minutes later i was on my front porch using the grill it was already very dark but very clear with lots of stars out. i had been noticing a lot of planes in the sky, a couple flew over so low i could almost read the numbers on them. it was very unusual for so much traffic in the sky, at least it seemed strange to see so many in just an hour or so. as i looked back down the valley approximately nw i noticed a star-like object much lower in the sky than the other stars that where out. the reason i even looked in that direction is because over the past 2 years my wife and i have seen something very similar to this about six times. the first time i saw it for several nights in a row around the same time of year and around the same of day. the object was staying in almost the exact same spot but it did move up and to the left and then settled back down and then moved up and to the right. so i called for my wife to come look at it, and to prove to me that i wasn't crazy..Lol she saw it too and we watched it together for a few minutes but it was very cold so she went back in the house. i continued watching it for several more minutes and it very slowly dropped behind the mountain range until i couldn't see it anymore. i kept looking up at the sky, at this point i couldn't stop. a few minutes later i noticed 2 planes very high in the sky flying in the direction of the object but much higher up. as they flew in the nw direction a small white light that looked much higher in the sky flew towards them at a speed i couldn't believe and then stopped right passed them. it was 100 times faster than the planes where, it hovered in the same spot for maybe a minute then flew away as fast as it passed the planes. all of this happened in about 30-45 minutes. after i went in the house it kinda shook me up a little, almost made me a little nervous. i really feel like an idiot, but i've seen enough over the years that i thought i should tell someone.
content.summary: I watched a star-like object hoover and move around in the same general area for about 30mins. this is probably the 5th or 6th time over 2 years i've seen it in the same general area.

content.detailedDescription: On 1/4/15 @ 3:41pm eastern time from north miami beach, fl. i took 3 photos . to my knowledge they look like orbs around the clouds and the sun but would like to know if this orb with the aura oval shape caught my curiousity and i am sharing them so you can explain if they are unknown? thanks
content.summary: Orbs hovering the clouds in nmb, fl.

content.detailedDescription: Watch in the sky with my wife when we noticed a bright round object it moved to our left the back to right came closer and disappeared i took pictures from my i phone then it was gone but i can still see the outline in the picture. after it was gone.
content.summary: Round  sphere moved from left to right then disappeared i took pictures and after it disappeared i noticed and outline on 2 pictures after i thought it was gone!

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were turning onto university avenue in provo, utah when we saw a bright orange light hovering in the sky about a block south of us. we began driving in its direction. it disappeared. moments later we could see it several blocks away so we kept driving in the direction. when we came close to it, we put the car in park on university avenue and i recorded it before pulling into a small business area. it was hovering over some trees and kept going lower and lower. suddenly, it went into a sideways oval shape and turned completely clear, almost invisible...But we could still see it and we watched it for a couple minutes before it lowered out of sight behind the trees. i quickly jumped out of the car only to see 4 or 5 more lights moving slowly and in sync above us and then hovering. we watched for several minutes. we called my sister who was at our house where we first saw the light...She ran outside and could see the bright orange lights blocks away, that my mom and i were directly under somehow we both looked away, i am not sure why...And they were gone. i rarely get headaches, but i was struck with the most pounding headache that it nearly threw me to the ground. i held my head in pain and it pounded. it was especially in the front, but went all around my head. i have never felt a headache like that in my entire life....Shortly after we left the sighting area, my headache left as quickly as it appeared. we recorded from my moms phones, the video quality is not great. for some reason the lights do not show up orange on the video, but when we play it on her phone, you can see the orange. in the first video, you will see the main light moving around. in the bottom right corner there is another one blinking. also, above that one, if you look very closely you can see something orange fading in and out. this recording is of the one we saw before the 5 other ones, but clearly we caught more than one in the video. the photos also show up much better on the phone and if you look at each one... there are three lights, and they form a perfect triangle together. nearly two years ago, my friend and i saw something similar from my balcony which is close to this sighting. it was 2 sets of three bright orange lights in the form of a triangle like the pictures appear. one by one the orange lights shot off the triangle form and turned clear/invisible...We watched them in their clear form for several minutes before they disappeared. we are close to provo canyon and power lines.
content.summary: 4 or 5 bright orange lights hovering and slowly forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I caught this from my car the other day. i ended the video (too soon) and i looked away for 1 second and it was gone, nowhere to be seen.
it was too slow and it really wasn't moving like a plane. if you can zoom in on it, the trail is way fatter and more billowing then a usual vapor trail it had an odd kind of gliding sideways trajectory that i have never seen before. it was a very surreal and seriously was not moving like a plane!
it was much closer and detailed in person. if you can zroom in you can see this a little better but really my phone didn't do it justice. in person it also appeared as the there was a light point or unwavering reflection at the front most point of it.
i am just realizing now that there was also no apparent audible sound from it either, which i also find strange.
i really really wish i kept the camera on it until it was out of my sight because it really seemed to disappear in a split second!
content.summary: From my car the other day. ended the video and i looked away for 1 second and it was gone, nowhere tobe seen.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was a summer night about 6 years ago (2008). i still remember it like yesterday. it was a nice night maybe 80 degrees and clear skies. me and my buddy went for a drive on the back roads outside of town. basically the farm/country roads. we were in high school and he just got his new car so we went for a drive. we we only driving for about 10 mins when the occurance happened. 
we were coming up to a really steep hill when i noticed an a lighted object hovering on top of the hill. it was in the air, on top of the hill and directly over the road way. and it was stationairy. 100% still. i remember it was pretty creepy so i too him to slow down. he seen it and we stopped. it had three lights. 2 bright white lights and a redish gold light that would come on once in a while.  once we stopped it moved fast, right above us.  the car had glass t-tops it was an older camaro so i could still see it. it wasn't directly above us but it was above us and to the right a little bit. so once it got there it hovered for about 15 seconds i seen the red light a couple times. 
i told my buddy to get the heck out of here and he floored it. when we took off i was still watching it and it took off fast and dissapeared. we both thought it was a ufo.  
we live by an airport and have our lives. we know what a helicopter looks like at night and what planes look like. we know what a helicopter sounds like, they are loud when they are above you. this object had no sound. the actual size of this thing was maybe 30-40 feet. i'm pretty sure it was triangular but it could have been disc shaped with 3 lights in a triangular pattern. 
so that's about it. some people believe me when i tell them. skeptics won't ever believe you and just think it's science fiction.(because we have to be the only ones in the universe). lol we are not even a grain of sand on a beach. well maybe a grain.. but that's my story. that's what happened to the t. thanks
content.summary: The ufo was stationary/hovering, bright lights, moved really fast and hovered over vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: While i was sitting in the shade i saw several objects that were diving in and out of a cloud... they made a stair step climb as they went up into the cloud.... at first i thought these were giant birds but birds don't do this type of thing..... all of the objects were joined in an elongated circle evenly spaced diving in and out of the cloud... i never would have seen them if it wasn't for the reflection each of them made being in contact with the sun's rays....
content.summary: Several objects diving in and out of a cloud reflecting the sun

content.detailedDescription: I'm not positive it was a ufo, it could potentially be a meteor.  i saw something in my regular line of vision (so it didn't come from way up) it caught fire and plunged to the ground immediately, like it had been struck by a missile.
content.summary: Watched something catch fire and crash in a wisconsin field

content.summary: New years eve recording gun shots, then ufo's came out a minute and a half.

content.detailedDescription: Look at the moon now 10:23pm 01/05/2015 under the moon to the left is the planet jupiter four of its moon are in perfect alignment three on top one at the bottom wow! a once in a lift time event something is going to happen don't know what? good or bad but something will happen! look up
content.summary: Jupiter with four moon alignment every rare

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south on route 13 with my daughter at 9:30pm when she noticed an object in the sky that seemed to be an airplane with flashing red and white lights. i dismissed it as an airplane for a moment as the object traveled southwest in the direction of d.C.  after about a mile or so i could clearly see this object had changed direction and was heading north/northwest towards us. it was quickly plain to see this was a triangle shaped object about 100/150 feet across. i must note the object changed altitude as it traveled north to less than 300 feet at our closest approach from the highway. i pulled over into a parking lot turned off the radio and rolled down the windows looking for an engine sound but we heard none.  the object continued northwest moving slowly toward the center of dover, changing directions to a s/w path and flew away.  i'm positive this was a triangle shaped object with 2 red and 2 white lights and this was a clear,bright night sky making the outline of the craft unmistakably easy to see.
content.summary: My daughter noticed an object ahead of us which at first sight seemed to be an airplane but i was shocked to find a ufo instead.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
** we need assistance asap, help or an investigative crew needed asap, terrorized and seeking answers. **
tonight i was having my nightly cigarette and noticed the mysterious anomalies afloat in the night sky. as the moon rose even they stay firm in their place in the earth's atmosphere.
my account of it all was over a course of months we have observed pulsating colours in the sky, from a far it looks like a plane or helicopter would, or a star or just a dot you could even say. we tried to use a scope many times to zoom in and both we could even tell it was nor a plane or helicopter or a drone, we know what all 3 do and their capabilities, we are educated people. the lights pulsed from red, yellow, blue, green, violet, and pink. there were 3 in the sky nearly in alignment, each pulsing in sequences to each other in what looked to be a communicative pattern, not to mention as they puled they seemed to respond in colour patterns to each's own. sometimes when we felt messages were not being sent or transceived they would all pulsate at the same pace and colours together sometimes. if we could zoom in closer we could make out a shape of what seemed to be either a disc or triangle. the colours would also outline the shape of the craft as they pulsed, each light pulsing in a specific spot.
i then felt a massive head ache come on which was completely abnormal and instantaneous as the craft drew closer. it is here nightly. never leaves. we have no pictures but the evidence lies in the sky. also on one account when it did disappear once a few months ago, it slowly and silently flew over our house, if it were a plane we  could have heard it, even if it were a helicopter, but it was silent, fast and suddenly shot out of sight as if it were the millennium falcon going into hyperspeed. it is visible from sundown through the night, they fly a short distance and stop, as if they are observing things, they cast long craft to earth beams at times in the mountains that appear golden/yellowy orange and what seems to be abductions from afar. the numbers are growing and we feel there is an invasion or incoming invasion of our area. they stay steady nightly.
please reply as soon as possible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating rainbow lights on unknown flying object subjecting viewer to psyhological and technical attacks

content.detailedDescription: Woke up and peered out of the window next to my bed to look for birds as is my habit. it was early in the morning at first light; not really light outside but not dark either. i saw an object with flickering lights red, white, and green hovering over the tree line across the little valley looking toward central avenue.  i thought it was a helicopter so didn't pay it much mind. but as i looked for birds, owls or hawks or anything, i noticed the thing did not move. i thought that was strange. if it was a helicopter i thought i would hear it so i cracked open the window to see if i could hear anything.  there was no noise at all. it just stayed there, and i thought it strange since helicopters make noise and usually don't hover like that, plus i didn't see a tail.  then i saw two other objects maybe smaller than the first one. they were to the left (the east side) of the first object. one of the objects darted in a straight line horizontally to the first object. then i grabbed my binoculars to see if i could see it better, but the screen was in the way. (it is a normal window and screen but when you put binoculars next to it the screen blurs the view. i could see the lights on the objects as if looking out of a window normally.) when i looked up from the window the things were gone. a moment later my husband came in and i told him what i saw. he was not in the room at the time, and when he came to the window the objects were already gone. i wished i had my camera at the time.
content.summary: Roundish object hovered quietly, then 2 others appeared, one shot horizontally to the first object, then all 3 disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We saw what looked like stars in the sky, but realized they were green and red lights.    some lower some higher, around the constellation orion. they were stationary the whole time.  we saw a plane fly past which made noise and was much lower.  these never moved the whole time we watched them, for about 20 minutes. there were about 8 of them. we were walking the dog down our street.  at first i thought they were stars or planets.  but then we thought what planet or star looks red and green?  they never moved at all.
content.summary: Red and green lights that looked like stars.  stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work. i noticed two very bright objects in the sky to the left of my direct sight. i was on the phone with my father at the time, and i told him i saw something strange and i had to call him back. the reason these objects looked so peculiar, was because they were on fire. red/orange and glowing bright. they looked circular, almost like two orbs on fire. i was in shock because i had never seen anything like these objects in the sky before. i pulled over to the side of the road, and started taking a video with my iphone. as the objects steadily moved closer to me (above me), i got really nervous and jumped back into my car and sped home. i called the police department in my town; i was on the phone with dispatch, explaining what i had seen, and how freaked out i was. i lost sight of the objects as i drove up the hill to my house. the dispatcher told me to go back and see if i could still see the objects. when i drove back down my hill, there was only one hovering. it appeared to be further in the distance than when i had last seen it. the woman on the other line told
me she would have an officer come out and "investigate".   the object being so far away at this point, made me feel a bit better, and i ended my conversation with the police department's dispatcher.  i then turned around back up my hill, and arrived safely at my residence. about 45 minutes later, i called the police department back, and asked if the officer had come to a conclusion about what it was that was floating in the sky. she told me they were unable to identify the object.
content.summary: Two glowing fireballs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Edge of terre haute, ind. incident lasted perhaps one half hour. the object was still present when we left the area. never seen anything like it before or since. we did not report it for fear of being negatively labeled. two other guys in our class also seen the object and did report it to the police. the locol newspaper did mention it in the morning edition the next day. both of the two reporting witnesses names were given by the newspaper. i will provide a sworn statement to the above if requested. i solemnly swear that at the time of the incident, the witness with me nor i had any discussion with the two reporting witnesses before, during or after the event concerning the sighting. the two reporting witnesses were at the extreme southern edge of terre haute. i don't know if they sighted the object before or after my friend and i seen it, or if they seen it at the same time as we did. the orange "ball" started at the size of approx. a tennis ball or golf ball, then zoomed toward us until it was the approx. size of a large grapefruit or a little smaller than a basket ball. black or dark grey smoke came or radiated from it. it came forward then retreated back to its original position very quickly several times, every ten or so seconds. we had no idea what the object was or is. neither of us felt fearful or any physical sensations, only a great curiosity at the wonder of it. i don't understand why everyone else did not see it. we were only about two blocks from a busy highway. the incident sure opened my mind to the subject of ufos.
content.summary: Round object zoomed close then retreated several times. a mist, steam or smoke radiated from it constantly from all around the edge and periodically from the side facing us. a friend and i were going to my home after school. it 0ccoured near the northern

content.detailedDescription:
I was attempting to observe comet lovejoy through 7 x 50 vivitar binoculars from my backyard in newark, ca. first saw it through binoculars flying very close to the seven sisters heading south west. at first i thought it was a satellite, until it changed direction and i saw a brief flare of light from a portion of it. it appeared to be a delta shape, dark gray in color. changed direction and speed several times with no marking lights, staying close to a south west course until i lost sight of it somewhere around diphda. course and speed changes were obvious as several occurred with multiple stars present in the field of view.

it seemed like around 3 to 5 minutes from seven sisters to diphda. much faster than an airliner at altitude would be, and no sound so it is highly unlikely it was at a lower altitude. checked planes overhead and saw nothing indicating a commercial flight through that airspace.
my heart started pounding when i saw the light flare and realized it was bigger than a satellite would be.
content.summary: Dark delta shaped craft appeared similar to satellite but changed direction and speed several times.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i had stepped onto our back porch to smoke and proceeded to star gaze like most nights. after about 7 minuets outside the conversation turned to binary stars and where one might look to see some. i pointed to orion, low on the horizon and my fiance suddenly points out an object coming above ththe house. we live in an area of mesa with high air craft visibility and a lot of flight traffic. there were obvious planes flying at various altitudes and this triangular object came on a north east path. as it came over there was no engine noise and the objects body seemed almost transparent. there was a single orange light at each point of the object and the rest looked as if it was trying to blend into the night sky. it moved at a moderate pace across the sky and was hard to track after it passed over. it was as if the object was covered by a cloud with how faint it was. there is not a cloud in the sky tonight, we are very excited about this.
content.summary: Fiance and i both witnessed low flying triangular form that looked completely transparent with three lights fly over us

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from work,strange object on the side of my car made me stop for 12minutes,and check the actions in the front of me.There is not much you can say,trust me.If you guys,are interestit,ill tell you whole story,it's very good.After 12min. the object was gone,where??...Don't know.
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Louvres, Other
content.summary: It was parked 50metersfrom my car

content.detailedDescription: I looked up into the sky and a very bright purple beam of light shot directly in to the sky then disappeared. i figured this must be a ufo or a very very bright shooting star or meteorite. i saw it come up from behind my neighbors roof and then it disappeared into the sky. i have never seen a shooting star like this. the color and brightness wasn't like anything i've ever seen.
content.summary: Bright purplish pink beam of light shooting 45 degrees to the south from the northeast
